Among the 49 million adults in England and Wales aged 16 or over, 2.2 million have been sexually assaulted by a current or former partner, 6.7 million subjected to non-sexual assault or abuse, and 2.5 million have been stalked. In every category, at least twice as many women as men have been victimised.
